title: Adobe Offer| CS| Bangalore
content:
Education: B.E in CS from Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: 6.5 Years
Prior Experience: SSE at unicorn startup
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Adobe India
Title/Level: Computer Scientist
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 33 L
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 80K USD over 4 years. 25% first year
PF: 1.5L
Variable Pay: 4.95 L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 33L + 4.95L + 1.5L + 16L = 56L

Prev Comp : 28 Fixed + 3L bonus

Is this lowball as per adobe standards? Can I negotiate further on these? What is the possibility of increasing these numbers as per Adobe HR policies?
